name: Fly Splat
description:
A 2D arcade mobile game where you are set in an office and there is an overload of flies to squish when they enter your vicinity. The player will have to tap the screen where the fly is, and the character will use both hands to squish it and kill it. These flies will cause and will try their best to annoy the player and make them frustrated.

*IMPORTANT* ONLY AVAILABLE FOR ANDROID
